findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.
findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

findings.filename: ../sc_datasets/compiled_DAppSCAN/Iosiro-Nexus Mutual Stacked Risk, On-chain MCR, and Swap Operator Smart Contract Audit/smart-contracts-60efdf64f2198050f7e6fcec57548d40e4f8598f/contracts/abstract/Iupgradable.sol
findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.
findings.name: use-multiple-require
